page.title: 08TRANSPORT AND LEISURE
page.content:
There are three pubs in the village _The Swan,The Eglinton Arms and The Cross Keys.The Eglinton Arms runs a jazz club on Monday nights and a disco on Sundays.The bowling club and the Masonic Lodge<1265>both are licensed and hold dances and cabarets.There is also an art club holding monthly meetings.In the school there are night classes in painting,country dancing and keep fit. Eaglesham is served by three buses.The first goes to Glasgow,the second's destination is East Kilbride and there is a once-a-week free bus to the ASDA supermarket in Blantyre.
